actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reinstate the formulas for computing primary insurance amounts which were in effect before the enactment of the Social Security Amendments of 1977, and for other purposes.
short_title: Social Security Benefit Restoration Act of 1982
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Benefit Restoration Act of 1982 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to reinstate, with specified revisions, the formulas for computing the primary insurance amount and maximum benefits which were in effect with respect to benefits for December 1978. Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services to recompute the primary insurance amounts of title II beneficiaries whose benefits are based upon the formula for computing the primary insurance amount as in effect with respect to benefits for months before January 1983. Makes such recomputation effective for benefits for months starting with January 1983.

titles.title: Social Security Benefit Restoration Act of 1982

A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reinstate the formulas for computing primary insurance amounts which were in effect before the enactment of the Social Security Amendments of 1977, and for other purposes.
